channel.title: CVE Feed for LiteSpeed Technologies -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for LiteSpeed Technologies -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-44000|2024-10-21T19:11:21.875Z -- litespeed%20technologies -- litespeed%20cache
item.description: Insufficiently Protected Credentials vulnerability in LiteSpeed Technologies LiteSpeed Cache allows Authentication Bypass.This issue affects LiteSpeed Cache: from n/a before 6.5.0.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-47637|2024-10-16T13:43:35.504Z -- litespeed%20technologies -- litespeed%20cache
item.description: : Relative Path Traversal vulnerability in LiteSpeed Technologies LiteSpeed Cache allows Path Traversal.This issue affects LiteSpeed Cache: from n/a through 6.4.1.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in LiteSpeed Technologies LiteSpeed Cache allows Stored XSS.This issue affects LiteSpeed Cache: from n/a through 6.5.0.2.
